    Subclasses of ApiException in ulb.infof307.g04.exceptions.api
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BadRequestException
    Thrown when the request triggers an HTTP 400 : Bad request status code
    class 
    CardCreationException
    Thrown when a card couldn't be created.
    class 
    ForbiddenException
    Thrown when the request triggers an HTTP 403 : Forbidden status code
    class 
    InvalidCredentialsException
    Thrown when the user enters wrong credentials at sign-in.
    class 
    InvalidOldPasswordException
    Thrown when the user enters a wrong current password at password change.
    class 
    NetworkException
    Thrown when an HTTP request can't be sent properly.
    class 
    NotFoundException
    Thrown when the request triggers an HTTP 500 : Internal Server Error status code
    class 
    PasswordMismatchException
    Thrown when the user changing his password fails to confirm the new password.
    class 
    RegistrationErrorException
    Thrown when the sign up process doesn't complete properly.
    class 
    ServerException
    Thrown when the request triggers an HTTP 500 : Internal Server Error status code
    class 
    UnauthorizedException
    Thrown when the request triggers an HTTP 401 : Unauthorized status code
    class 
    UnsupportedMediaTypeException
    Thrown when the request triggers an HTTP 415 : Unsupported media type status code
    class 
    UserNotFoundException
    Thrown when the user can't be found.
